name: nativescript-ng2-magic
description: Magically integrate your Angular2 web app with NativeScript.
author: Nathan Walker <walkerrunpdx@gmail.com> (http://github.com/NathanWalker)

scripts.postinstall: npm i image-to-ascii-cli && cd ../.. && tns create nativescript --template https://github.com/NativeScript/template-hello-world-ng && node node_modules/nativescript-ng2-magic/fix-files.js && ./node_modules/image-to-ascii-cli/bin/image-to-ascii -i https://cdn.filestackcontent.com/XXMT4f8S8OGngNsJj0pr
